title: Champs
body:
Hi all, just wanted to ask about any champs that are fun to play?
I main Darius, Illaoi, Renekton, Lulu, Jarvan IV, Morgana, Kennen. 
I kinda wanted to pick up Gnar but he's 6300 ip so i kind of want to make sure he's going to be fun to play. Im not sure just drop me a few suggestions on fulfilling champs to play.

P.s i tried xerath and he's fun as but i want to play him when i get a lil better at league at later times.

replies.body:
Gnar is definitely fun. Just got back into him after a few months of pretending to be an ADC and forgot how much fun he was.

Nothing quite like losing being in a losing trade, then going mega and turning it around and deleting your opponent.
haha i will think about playing him. is he still ok after his last nerf?

I haven't really noticed much of a nerf to be honest. My build has changed to make Frozen Mallet a priority item so maybe that's having an impact.

At the recent IWCQ in Brazil he was one of the most heavily banned champs so you could take that as a sign that he's just fine in his current state.

how tf do i play him! help!? i got him and went down 1/10 against a riven that wasn't even level 30!!! i was so tiltmilliated xD. Ik i cant expect to pick him up immediately but i felt absolutely helpless.

No one has mentioned {{champion:120}} ?
I find him one of the most, if not the most fun to play, along with {{champion:50}}{{champion:57}}   and {{champion:3}} .
But I <3 tanky champs that deal heaps of damage, even when you go full tank.
I dislike playing ADC's, but do enjoy a few squishy AP champs.

But mostly I just tank. It's simply more enjoyable (for me).
cheers, i think rengar is getting a rework. so i might put him on hold for a while, until his rework ofcourse.
